ranAyah1.english: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

ranAyah3.english: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

ranAyah6.arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
ranAyah6.english: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.

ranAyah7.english: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

ranAyah8.english: He has succeeded who purifies it,

ranAyah9.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
ranAyah9.english: We have certainly created man in the best of stature.

ranAyah10.english: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

ranAyah11.english: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

ranAyah12.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
ranAyah12.english: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet Him.

ranAyah13.arabic: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا
ranAyah13.english: He who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed.

ranAyah14.english: Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak'

ranAyah15.english: Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,'

ranAyah16.english: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

ranAyah17.arabic: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
ranAyah17.english: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

ranAyah18.english: And those who strive for Us – We will surely guide them to Our ways.

ranAyah19.arabic: وَقَضَىٰ رَبُّكَ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوا إِلَّا إِيَّاهُ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا
ranAyah19.english: And your Lord has decreed that you worship none but Him, and that you be good to parents.

ranAyah20.english: He said, 'My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance].'

ranAyah21.arabic: عَسَى اللَّهُ أَن يَجْعَلَ بَيْنَكُمْ وَبَيْنَ الَّذِينَ عَادَيْتُم مِّنْهُم مَّوَدَّةً
ranAyah21.english: Perhaps Allah will put, between you and those to whom you have been enemies, affection.

ranAyah22.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ وَمَلَائِكَتَهُ يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ
ranAyah22.english: Indeed, Allah and His angels send blessings upon the Prophet.

ranAyah23.arabic: فَبِمَا رَحْمَةٍ مِّنَ اللَّهِ لِنتَ لَهُمْ
ranAyah23.english: So by mercy from Allah, [O Muhammad], you were lenient with them.
